mapper.insert: insert into tbl_accompany ( accompany_no, mem_no, write_date, start_date, end_date, title, content, accompany_status_code, gender_code, use_yn ) values ( accompany_no_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, sysdate, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{accompany_status_code}, #{gender_code}, #{use_yn} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, ( SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_common_reply WHERE item_no=accompany_no AND type_code='S0010' ) AS reply_count FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_accompany WHERE accompany_no=${accompany_no} AND use_yn=${use_yn}) b;

select accompany.accompany_no, accompany.mem_no, accompany.write_date, accompany.start_date, accompany.end_date, accompany.title, accompany.content, accompany.attach_file, accompany.accompany_status_code, accompany.gender_code, accompany.use_yn, accompany.hits, member.mem_name from tbl_accompany accompany, tbl_member member where accompany.mem_no = member.mem_no and accompany.accompany_no=#{accompany_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_accompany SET start_date=#{start_date}, end_date=#{end_date}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, accompany_status_code=#{accompany_status_code}, gender_code=#{gender_code} WHERE accompany_no=#{accompany_no}
mapper.select: select accompany.rnum, accompany.accompany_no, accompany.mem_no, accompany.write_date, accompany.start_date, accompany.end_date, accompany.title, accompany.content, accompany.attach_file, accompany.accompany_status_code, accompany.gender_code, accompany.use_yn, accompany.hits, member.mem_name from (select * from ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, b.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_accompany where use_yn=#{use_yn} AND tbl_accompany.ACCOMPANY_STATUS_CODE not like #{accompany_status_code} ORDER BY accompany_no desc )b ) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5 ) accompany, tbl_member member where accompany.mem_no = member.mem_no
